message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $130. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your item, but I can only pay up to $110 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I could let it go for $120. It's a steal at that price!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I can only pay up to $115 for the product.
